amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for enforcement at IRS by $788,111,800 and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for enforcement at IRS by $788,111,800 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Huizenga (MI).
